constants
=========

.. py:module:: constants

.. autoapi-nested-parse::

   Constants for electropherogram analysis.
   @author: Anja Hess
   @date: 2023-JUL-01

Module Contents
---------------

.. py:data:: ACCEPTED_FORMATS
   :value: ['.csv', '.png', '.jpeg', '.jpg']


.. py:data:: DISTANCE
   :value: 20


.. py:data:: CUSTOM_MIN_PEAK_HEIGHT
   :value: 50


.. py:data:: PEAK_PROMINANCE
   :value: (0.2, None)


.. py:data:: HALO_FACTOR
   :value: 0.4


.. py:data:: YCOL
   :value: 'normalized_fluorescent_units'


.. py:data:: XCOL
   :value: 'bp_pos'


.. py:data:: YLABEL
   :value: 'Sample Intensity [Normalized FU]'


.. py:data:: XLABEL
   :value: 'Size [bp]'


.. py:data:: palettediff3
   :value: ['darkgrey', 'black', 'grey', '#d56763', '#85ada3', '#2d435b', '#eacdcb', '#fcd2a1', '#d56763',...


.. py:data:: palettediff2
   :value: ['darkgrey', '#d56763', '#fcd2a1', '#85ada3', '#eacdcb', '#a7c6c9', '#2d435b', '#d56763',...


.. py:data:: peak_dict
